#RailRules#
;---------------------------------------------------------------
;    Network Addon Mod
;    Rail Basic RUL
;    { 0x0a5bcf4b - 0xaa5bcf57 - 0x00000005 }
;    Has Supplement: NO
;---------------------------------------------------------------
;
; 000: straight
